title: Fish, chips, mushy peas and tartare sauce
description: James' own version of traditional fish and chips with crisp beer batter and all the trimmings.
ingredients: salt and freshly ground black pepper
1 whole fillet of cod, cut in two
300g/10½oz chipping potatoes, peeled and cut unto 2cm/½in sticks
½ lemon, cut into wedges, for serving
